instructionMessage: Let's start building your salary report with information about your current job. All the information you share with us will be kept strictly confidential and will not be shared with any third party.

minimiseContent: Annual salary increases stand between 2% - 5%, while a promotion or a new job might get you a salary raise between 10% - 20%...
thanksForShare.headline.under50percent: Your Salary is at the bottom of the scale, do you deserve a pay raise?
thanksForShare.headline.under70percent: Your Salary is in the middle of the scale, would you consider better paid jobs?
thanksForShare.headline.under100percent: Congratulations, your Salary is at the top of the scale, is time for getting a promotion?
thanksForShare.item1.headline: 1 - Read Your Salary Report
thanksForShare.item1.content: This Salary Survey help you compare with people who do the same job at a similar company, have similar experience and live where you do. In general if your earnings fall below the 50% you probably want to start thinking about asking for a raise or looking for a new job.
thanksForShare.item2.headline: 2 - Strategize
thanksForShare.item2.content: Salary negotiation is always challenging, keep it professional, friendly, data driven and timely. Leverage your skills and experience to justify your salary raise request.
thanksForShare.item3.headline: 3 - Negotiate
thanksForShare.item3.content: Be ambitious but realistic, salary increases vary depends on industry but average stands between 2% to 5%, while a promotion or a new job might get you a salary increase between 10% to 20%.

highestDemandNoData: We find no data related to Project Manager with level Experienced in IT - Software. While we are improving, could you update your Expected Job Title, Job Level and Job Category to know how to get promoted? Or please leave us your email in below field.
sendMeDesc: Help us filling email so we can send top skills to you. Then you can revise skills trend anytime you want.
sendMeDescNoData: Let us know your email. Then we can send you your skills trend as soon as we have data.
contestDescription1: This year we are holding an amazing big contest for all IT developers and those who are interested in implementing application. Our contest is continuously running through 4 months from 18 Jun 2015 to 14 Sep 2015 with the following timeline. NOW, we are open for submissions and welcome all guys who have a burning passion in building a successful application to join the contest. So, are you ready to go?
contestDescription2: In this first phase, between 18 Jun and 17 Jul 2015, your first mission is figuring out a challenge to get instructions to join a $2,000 contest! Your challenge is to read in a string of Braille characters (using standard English Braille defined here) and print off the word in standard English letters.
contestDescription3: The input will consistent of an array of 2x6 Braille characters, characters used for Blind people. A lowered bump is a dot character '.', while a raised bump is an upper-case 'O' character.
